snippet: Early Sunday, doctors at Bellevue Hospital Center delivered a boy by Caesarean section after Raizy Glauber of Brooklyn was killed in a car crash.
abstract: Obstetricians who have faced similarly grim situation as the one facing doctors who hastily delivered son of Raizy Glauber after devastating early-morning car crash in Brooklyn recall difficulties making the split-second decisions required in performing an emergency Caesarean section.
lead_paragraph: Early Sunday, doctors at Bellevue Hospital Center delivered a boy by Caesarean section after Raizy Glauber of Brooklyn was killed in a car crash.

headline.seo: Double Emergency: A Pregnant Woman Dying From Injury
headline.main: Double Crisis: A Pregnant Woman Is Dying
headline.print_headline: Double Crisis: A Pregnant Woman Is Dying
